header: The Soldiers Report to the Leaders

verse: While the women ·went to tell Jesus’ followers [were on their way], some of the soldiers who had been guarding the tomb went into the city to tell the ·leading [chief] priests everything that had happened.
Then the priests met with the elders and made a plan. They paid the soldiers a ·large amount of money [substantial bribe]
and said to them, “Tell the people that Jesus’ ·followers [disciples] came during the night and stole ·the body [him away] while you were asleep.
